name: ISO City
description:
********************************************************************************************************************************
This game is in beta! I created the entire game by myself and I work on it when I can. All funds will go to finishing the game and making a PC and Mac version. Please feel free to e-mail me with any bugs or suggestions.
********************************************************************************************************************************

Welcome to ISO City!

ISO stands for Isometric. Build your very own miniature isometric city! Sandbox mode lets you build with no restrictions. Missions give you a little bit of a challenge.

Features
- 1200+ Tile Cities
- 30+ City Assets
- Sandbox Mode
- Take a screenshot of your city to share on social media
- 10 Mission
- Fun for everyone
- No In-app purchases ever!!
